sqlMap.select: /*mesStatisticsDAO.selectMesStatisticsList*/ WITH dateTemplate AS ( SELECT CONCAT(e_year,'-', e_month, '-', e_date) AS eDate FROM e_tmpyear, e_month, e_date WHERE 1=1 AND CONCAT(e_year,'-', e_month, '-', e_date) BETWEEN #topStartDate# AND #topEndDate# ORDER BY e_year, e_month, e_date ) SELECT d.eDate AS eDate , MAINTANCE_TYPE AS mMaintanceType , MAINTANCE_STAFF_NAME AS mMaintanceStaffName , COUNT(MAINTANCE_NUM) AS mMaintanceCount FROM dateTemplate d LEFT JOIN M_MAINTANCE M ON (DATE_FORMAT(MAINTANCE_DATE, '%Y-%m-%d') = d.eDate) GROUP BY d.eDate ORDER BY d.eDate ASC

/*mesStatisticsDAO.selectMesMaintanceMemList*/ WITH dateTemplate AS ( SELECT CONCAT(e_year,'-', e_month, '-', e_date) AS eDate FROM e_tmpyear, e_month, e_date WHERE 1=1 AND CONCAT(e_year,'-', e_month, '-', e_date) BETWEEN #topStartDate# AND #topEndDate# ORDER BY e_year, e_month, e_date ) SELECT d.eDate AS eDate , MAINTANCE_TYPE AS mMaintanceType , MAINTANCE_STAFF_NAME AS mMaintanceStaffName , COUNT(MAINTANCE_NUM) AS mMaintanceCount FROM dateTemplate d LEFT JOIN M_MAINTANCE M ON (DATE_FORMAT(MAINTANCE_DATE, '%Y-%m-%d') = d.eDate) GROUP BY MAINTANCE_STAFF_NUM ORDER BY d.eDate ASC

/*mesStatisticsDAO.selectMesMaintanceSrList*/ WITH dateTemplate AS ( SELECT CONCAT(e_year,'-', e_month, '-', e_date) AS eDate FROM e_tmpyear, e_month, e_date WHERE 1=1 AND CONCAT(e_year,'-', e_month, '-', e_date) BETWEEN #topStartDate# AND #topEndDate# ORDER BY e_year, e_month, e_date ) SELECT d.eDate AS eDate , MAINTANCE_TYPE AS mMaintanceType , MAINTANCE_STAFF_NAME AS mMaintanceStaffName , COUNT(MAINTANCE_NUM) AS mMaintanceCount FROM dateTemplate d LEFT JOIN M_MAINTANCE M ON (DATE_FORMAT(MAINTANCE_DATE, '%Y-%m-%d') = d.eDate) GROUP BY MAINTANCE_TYPE ORDER BY d.eDate ASC

/*mesStatisticsDAO.selectAssetList*/ WITH dateTemplate AS ( SELECT CONCAT(e_year,'-', e_month, '-', e_date) AS eDate FROM e_tmpyear, e_month, e_date WHERE 1=1 AND CONCAT(e_year,'-', e_month, '-', e_date) BETWEEN #topStartDate# AND #topEndDate# ORDER BY e_year, e_month, e_date ) SELECT d.eDate AS eDate , ASSET_MAKER AS sAssetMaker , COUNT(A.ASSET_NUM) AS sAssetCount FROM dateTemplate d LEFT JOIN A_ASSET A ON (DATE_FORMAT(ASSET_DATE, '%Y-%m-%d') = d.eDate) GROUP BY d.eDate ORDER BY d.eDate ASC;

/*mesStatisticsDAO.selectAssetUsList*/ WITH dateTemplate AS ( SELECT CONCAT(e_year,'-', e_month, '-', e_date) AS eDate FROM e_tmpyear, e_month, e_date WHERE 1=1 AND CONCAT(e_year,'-', e_month, '-', e_date) BETWEEN #topStartDate# AND #topEndDate# ORDER BY e_year, e_month, e_date ) SELECT d.eDate AS eDate , ASSET_MAKER AS sAssetMaker , COUNT(AU.ASSET_NUM) AS sAssetCount FROM dateTemplate d LEFT JOIN A_ASSET A ON (DATE_FORMAT(ASSET_DATE, '%Y-%m-%d') = d.eDate) LEFT JOIN A_ASSET_USE AU ON (A.ASSET_NUM = AU.ASSET_NUM) GROUP BY d.eDate ORDER BY d.eDate ASC;

/*mesStatisticsDAO.selectAssetUsMcList*/ WITH dateTemplate AS ( SELECT CONCAT(e_year,'-', e_month, '-', e_date) AS eDate FROM e_tmpyear, e_month, e_date WHERE 1=1 AND CONCAT(e_year,'-', e_month, '-', e_date) BETWEEN #topStartDate# AND #topEndDate# ORDER BY e_year, e_month, e_date ) SELECT d.eDate AS eDate , ASSET_MAKER AS sAssetMaker , COUNT(AU.ASSET_NUM) AS sAssetCount FROM dateTemplate d LEFT JOIN A_ASSET A ON (DATE_FORMAT(ASSET_DATE, '%Y-%m-%d') = d.eDate) LEFT JOIN A_ASSET_USE AU ON (A.ASSET_NUM = AU.ASSET_NUM) GROUP BY A.ASSET_MAKER ORDER BY d.eDate ASC;

/*mesStatisticsDAO.selectIEUsList*/ WITH dateTemplate AS ( SELECT CONCAT(e_year,'-', e_month, '-', e_date) AS eDate FROM e_tmpyear, e_month, e_date WHERE 1=1 AND CONCAT(e_year,'-', e_month, '-', e_date) BETWEEN #topStartDate# AND #topEndDate# ORDER BY e_year, e_month, e_date ) SELECT d.eDate , ASSET_MAKER AS sAssetMaker , ASSET_USE_TYPE AS sAssetUesType , COUNT(AU.ASSET_NUM) AS sAssetCount FROM dateTemplate d LEFT JOIN A_ASSET A ON (DATE_FORMAT(ASSET_DATE, '%Y-%m-%d') = d.eDate) LEFT JOIN A_ASSET_USE AU ON (A.ASSET_NUM = AU.ASSET_NUM) GROUP BY AU.ASSET_USE_TYPE ORDER BY d.eDate ASC;

/*mesStatisticsDAO.selectOutputYsList*/ WITH dateTemplate AS ( SELECT CONCAT(e_year, '-', LPAD(e_month, 2, '0')) AS eDate FROM e_tmpyear, e_month WHERE 1=1 AND CONCAT(e_year, '-', LPAD(e_month, 2, '0')) BETWEEN '2020-01' AND '2027-12' ORDER BY e_year, e_month ) SELECT LEFT(d.eDate, 4) AS sYear, COUNT(O_OUTPUT_NUM) AS sOutputCount FROM dateTemplate d LEFT JOIN O_OUTPUT O ON (DATE_FORMAT(O_STARDATE, '%Y-%m') = d.eDate) GROUP BY LEFT(d.eDate, 4) ORDER BY sYear ASC;

/*mesStatisticsDAO.selectOutputMsList*/ WITH dateTemplate AS ( SELECT CONCAT(e_year, '-', LPAD(e_month, 2, '0')) AS eDate FROM e_tmpyear, e_month WHERE 1=1 AND CONCAT(e_year, '-', LPAD(e_month, 2, '0')) BETWEEN '2024-01' AND '2024-12' ORDER BY e_year, e_month ) SELECT d.eDate, COUNT(O_OUTPUT_NUM) AS sOutputCount FROM dateTemplate d LEFT JOIN O_OUTPUT O ON (DATE_FORMAT(O_STARDATE, '%Y-%m') = d.eDate) GROUP BY d.eDate ORDER BY d.eDate ASC;

/*mesStatisticsDAO.selectOutputsMemList*/ WITH dateTemplate AS ( SELECT CONCAT(e_year,'-', e_month, '-', e_date) AS eDate FROM e_tmpyear, e_month, e_date WHERE 1=1 AND CONCAT(e_year,'-', e_month, '-', e_date) BETWEEN '2024-01-01' AND '2024-12-31' ORDER BY e_year, e_month, e_date ) SELECT d.eDate AS eDate , k_staff_name AS kStaffName , COUNT(O_OUTPUT_NUM) AS sOutputCount FROM dateTemplate d LEFT JOIN O_OUTPUT O ON (DATE_FORMAT(O_STARDATE, '%Y-%m-%d') = d.eDate) GROUP BY k_staff_name ORDER BY d.eDate ASC;

/*mesStatisticsDAO.firstValuList*/ SELECT '장애관리' AS eWordA, COUNT(*) AS eValueA FROM I_ISSUE AS ii WHERE eIssueStatus != '삭제' AND DATE_FORMAT(ii.eRequestDate, '%Y-%m-%d') BETWEEN #topStartDate# AND #topEndDate#
UNION ALL SELECT '점검관리' AS eWordA, COUNT(*) AS eValueA FROM INSPECTION AS insp WHERE insp.eStatus != '삭제' AND DATE_FORMAT(insp.eRegistrationDate, '%Y-%m-%d') BETWEEN #topStartDate# AND #topEndDate#
UNION ALL SELECT '변경관리' AS eWordA, COUNT(*) AS eValueA FROM I_CHANGE AS ic WHERE ic.eStatus != '삭제' AND DATE_FORMAT(ic.eReqDate, '%Y-%m-%d') BETWEEN #topStartDate# AND #topEndDate#
UNION ALL SELECT '문제관리' AS eWordA, COUNT(*) AS eValueA FROM I_BLUE_ISSUE AS ibi WHERE ibi.eStatus != '삭제' AND DATE_FORMAT(ibi.eReqDate, '%Y-%m-%d') BETWEEN #topStartDate# AND #topEndDate#
UNION ALL SELECT 'SR관리' AS eWordA, COUNT(*) AS eValueA FROM I_BLUE_SR AS ibs WHERE ibs.eStatus != '삭제' AND DATE_FORMAT(ibs.eReqDate, '%Y-%m-%d') BETWEEN #topStartDate# AND #topEndDate#

/*mesStatisticsDAO.selectProjectList*/ SELECT eProjectName AS eWordA, DATE_FORMAT(eStartDate, '%Y-%m-%d') AS eWordB, DATE_FORMAT(eEndDate, '%Y-%m-%d') AS eWordC, eManager AS eWordD, eProjectPM AS eWordE, ePMContact AS eWordF, COUNT(prf.eReportFileNUM) eValueD, SUM(CASE WHEN prf.eFileRowGubun = 'A' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS eValueA, SUM(CASE WHEN prf.eFileRowGubun = 'B' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS eValueB, SUM(CASE WHEN prf.eFileRowGubun = 'C' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS eValueC FROM P_PROJECT AS pp LEFT JOIN P_Report_file AS prf ON pp.P_PROJECT_NUM = prf.eProjectNum
WHERE 1=1 AND eProjectStatus != '삭제'
AND DATE_FORMAT(eStartDate, '%Y-%m-%d') >= #topStartDate#
AND DATE_FORMAT(eEndDate, '%Y-%m-%d') <= #topEndDate#
GROUP BY pp.P_PROJECT_NUM

/*mesStatisticsDAO.eAssetTmpMakerList*/ SELECT COUNT(eei.eEquipmentItemKey) AS eValueA ,eei.eAssetMaker AS eWordA ,SUM(CASE WHEN eei.eEntryExporterDate IS NULL OR eei.eEntryExporterDate = '' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS eValueB FROM E_EQUIPMENT_IN_ITEM AS eei LEFT JOIN E_EQUIPMENT_IN AS ee ON (ee.eEquipmentInKey =eei.eEquipmentInKey) WHERE ee.eStatus != '삭제' AND (eei.eAssetMaker IS NOT NULL AND eei.eAssetMaker != '') AND DATE_FORMAT(ee.eEntryImportDate, '%Y-%m-%d') BETWEEN #topStartDate# AND #topEndDate# GROUP BY eei.eAssetMaker

/*mesStatisticsDAO.eAssetTmpTypeList*/ SELECT COUNT(eei.eAssetTypeName) AS eValueC ,eei.eAssetTypeName AS eWordB ,SUM(CASE WHEN eei.eEntryExporterDate IS NULL OR eei.eEntryExporterDate = '' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS eValueD FROM E_EQUIPMENT_IN_ITEM AS eei LEFT JOIN E_EQUIPMENT_IN AS ee ON (ee.eEquipmentInKey =eei.eEquipmentInKey) WHERE ee.eStatus != '삭제' AND DATE_FORMAT(ee.eEntryImportDate, '%Y-%m-%d') BETWEEN #topStartDate# AND #topEndDate# GROUP BY eei.eAssetTypeName
